alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Christian; De Witt; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 10:44AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING A WINTRY MIXTURE OF PRECIPITATION AND HEAVY SNOW TO PARTS OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and east central Illinois, from Clinton to Taylorville east to Mattoon and Danville. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mixture of freezing rain and sleet is expected from Danville to Taylorville by late morning, with areas further south switching over in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Christian; De Witt; Douglas; Macon; Moultrie; Piatt; Shelby; Vermilion
